charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. 1711  MISAPPROPRIATION OF POSTAL FUNDS BY A POSTAL SERVICE EMPLOYEE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby sentenced to probation for a term of 3 years. Said term of probation comes with standard and special conditions of supervision, as more fully stated in said Judgment. The Defendant shall pay to the United States a fine of $1,000. A Special Assessment of $100 shall be paid to the United States District Court Clerk forthwith. Defendant shall perform 100 hours of community service at a rate of not less than 10 hours per month, as approved by the Probation Officer.
